data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Abyan, Yemen.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Abyan, Yemen
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 494,696 lost in Abyan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Abyan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Abyan, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people. Make the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, may the churches in Abyan, Yemen honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Abyan, Yemen.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Abyan to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Abyan
location.cities_list: Zinjibār, Jawf al Maqbābah, Ahl Mohammed bin Ahmed, Al Maḩfid, Aḩwar
location.cities_list_w_pop: Zinjibār (19,879), Jawf al Maqbābah (14,175), Ahl Mohammed bin Ahmed (1,800), Al Maḩfid, Aḩwar
